title: Riven mains out there
body:
If there are any riven mains or people interested in maining riven looking for some people to weeb out with im apart of a club that has some like minded individuals no matter your elo its a club to share thoughts stratagies and even find duo queue partners if you want to join send a message to (Zydro Smaysh) our club leader and hell add you asap.
keep in mind you do actually have to be a riven main you cant just play her ocasionaly you need to actually main her or at least want to

replies.body: Sounds good :D however this is not my main, add Mesprit in game and I will get back to you :3

yeah i will add you but you will have to add the
leader to join
Sounds great, add me up ign: Maherkbt

yeah i will add you but you will have to add the
 leader to join
